'''''The Legend of Gurthang''''' is a [[:Category:Fan films|fan film]] directed, written, and produced by Jared Belt. It was released online.

==Plot==
From the official website:
<blockquote>​"The Legend of Gurthang" is an original story set in [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien's]] Middle Earth, inspired by and loosely based on [[The Children of Hurin]], by J.R.R. Tolkien and [[Christopher Tolkien]].

Set in the [[Second Age]] at the height of the [[War of the Last Alliance]], this story follows a man from the kingdom of [[Arnor]], on his lone mission to the far island of [[Tol Morwen]], to find and retrieve [[Gurthang]], a legendary sword of great power once owned by Turin, son of Hurin.</blockquote>
